API Reference

    import datetime

charlatan
---------

The module provides the following shortcuts:

* load
* install_all_fixtures
* set_hook
* ``fixtures_manager`` object.


.. autofunction:: charlatan.load

.. autofunction:: charlatan.install_all_fixtures
